titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament; straightly charging and forbidding all in-keepers, victuallers, alehouse-keepers, or other persons whatsoever, to harbour or entertain any marriners, sea-men, water-men, &c. prest into any of His Majesties or merchants ships employed in this service after the beat of the drum, and proclamation made to give them notice, to repair on boord the severall ships to which they belong. Ordered by the Lords and Commoms in Parliament, that this declaration be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com. Also a letter from Sir Iohn Hotham. Ordered by Commons in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament; straightly charging and forbidding all in-keepers, victuallers, alehouse-keepers, or other persons whatsoever, to harbour or entertain any marriners, sea-men, water-men, &c. prest into any of His Majesties or merchants ships employed in this service after the beat of the drum, and proclamation made to give them notice, to repair on boord the severall ships to which they belong. Ordered by the Lords and Commoms in Parliament, that this declaration be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com. Also a letter from Sir Iohn Hotham. Ordered by Commons in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husbands, and are to be sold at his shop in the middle Temple,

notesStmt.note: In place of Hotham's letter announcing the desertion of Sir Hugh Cholmley to the King are given the Commons' actions upon receipt of the news, which were separately printed as a broadside with caption : Die lunae, 3 April, 1643.
Imperfect: Text on reel is stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
